sentence.Network_en: The museum will have a permanent exhibition of 60 vintage cars.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个博物馆将长期展出60辆老爷车。

sentence.Network_en: The 1985 vintage has a stronger bouquet and slight caramelly flavour.
sentence.Network_cn: 这种1985年酿制的陈年佳酿味道更醇厚，带有一种淡淡的焦糖甜味。

sentence.Network_en: Vintage ports must be decanted to remove natural sediments.
sentence.Network_cn: 上等的波尔图葡萄酒必须倒入其他容器中以滤除自然沉淀物。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 年份也分为NV(non-vintage)，标年年份(Vintage)，香槟通常用三种法定葡萄酿制而成，分别为Pinot Noir、Pinot Meunier和Chardonna…
最复古（vintage）毕业照（来自南京东南大学）南京东南大学校园内，身着民国时期(the Republican period)学生装的毕业生在拍摄各 …
所谓的“古着”（vintage）潮流和Martin Margiela的服装，均在服装的面貌上，重建“去年那件织锦缎夹袍”。 　　在英国与日本，贩卖“古着”…
年份香槟（Vintage） 用产自同一年的葡萄酿制而成，是具有丰富个性的香槟。随年份不同，所体现的个性也不同。

秉持著现代复古(Modern Vintage)的精神，此次Men’s Classic Steel，带你回到最初的男人味，挥别虚张声势的夸张表款，低调得亮眼 …
首页-兵工厂四号仓库-淘宝网 ... utility bag 多用包 vintage jewelry 手工复古饰品 canvas wallet 帆布钱包.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: alteration (influenced by vintner) of earlier vendage, from Old French vendange, from Latin vindemia (from vinum 'wine' + demere 'remove')

encyclopedia.content: vintage是指博物馆的珍藏。Vintage是“甲之垃圾，乙之瑰宝” ，能称得上“古董”的，其本身必须是精品，有历史价值，有历史定位的，并且能代表某个时期的某些特定元素。

entry.tran: （某优质葡萄酒的）产地和年份;特定年份酿的葡萄酒
entry.def: The vintage of a good quality wine is the year and place that it was made before being stored to improve it. You can also use vintage to refer to the wine that was made in a certain year.

example.ex: Many predict 1991 will rival the great vintage of 1965...
example.tran: 许多人预测1991年酿制的葡萄酒可以与1965年生产的佳酿相媲美。

example.ex: This wine is from one of the two best vintages of the decade in this region...
example.tran: 这种酒是该地区这10年来两个葡萄丰收旺年之一所产的佳酿。

entry.tran: （葡萄酒）优质的，上等的，佳酿的
entry.def: Vintage wine is good quality wine that has been stored for several years in order to improve its quality.

example.ex: If you can buy only one case at auction, it should be vintage port.
example.tran: 如果你在拍卖会上只能买一样东西，那就应该是上等的波尔图葡萄酒。

entry.tran: （汽车或飞机)老式的，古色古香的
entry.def: Vintage cars or aeroplanes are old but are admired because they are considered to be the best of their kind.

example.ex: The museum will have a permanent exhibition of 60 vintage cars.
example.tran: 这个博物馆将长期展出60辆老爷车。

entry.def: You can use vintage to describe something which is the best and most typical of its kind.

example.ex: At the press conference, James is on vintage form...
example.tran: 在这次记者招待会上，詹姆斯的表现最出色。

example.ex: This is vintage comedy at its best.
example.tran: 这是这类喜剧中的代表性作品。

means.word_mean: 1. a season's yield of wine from a vineyard

means.word_mean: 采摘葡萄酿酒的期间（或季节）；葡萄收获期（或季节）

sentences.en: The 1983 vintage was one of the best.

means.word_mean: 特定年份（或地方）酿制的酒；酿造年份
（过去某个时期）典型的，优质的；（某人的）最佳作品的

sentences.en: This piece of music is vintage Bach.
sentences.cn: 这首乐曲是巴赫的代表作。

means.word_mean: 古色古香的（指 1917–1930 年间制造，车型和品味受人青睐的）

sentences.en: This is a vintage car made in 1917.
sentences.cn: 这是一辆造于一九一七年的古老而名贵的车。
